items.sentence: Did any of you actually do what the teacher told you to do?
Tom Jackson was indicted in 2013 on drug smuggling charges.
I wish Tom would stop parking his car in front of my house.
Tom was wearing a baseball cap when I saw him this morning.
Tom apologized to Mary for the inconvenience he had caused.
Without Tom\'s help, Mary would\'ve been unable to do that.
Tom admitted the only reason he did that was for the money.
There are a lot of really good-looking people in Australia.
I want to go and change into that shirt I bought yesterday.
How many bus stops are there between your house and Tom\'s?
Many people who say they aren\'t afraid of dying are lying.
Mary doesn\'t make pie crust. She usually buys it pre-made.
It was careless of you to leave your umbrella on the train.
As far as I know, I don\'t have any relatives in Australia.
I can understand some French, but I can\'t really speak it.
I can\'t believe how bad the service at this restaurant is.
I can\'t come in to work today because I have a high fever.
Tom is willing to pay up to three hundred dollars for that.
Tom went to the refrigerator, looking for something to eat.
As soon as the results are made public, I\'ll let you know.
